title: LF someone to help me get out of silver
body: I'm a JG main I can almost play any champ

replies.body: Hi, I'm the leader of my team. We are looking for people who are potential and follow the instruction. I received a gold in s6 almost platinum in another server. However, since I moved to Australia, some of my team follow me up to here. We are welcome to have new members. If you are interest add JLYFireGod and leave some massage there, saying your name and what you good at. Looking forward to be my crew member.
